question: You have recently landed in a foreign country on a work visa and need information about the place in and around the city. Write a letter to the relocation assistance provider seeking help and in your letter,Write why you are writing the letterWhat kind of information you wantHow and by when you can get the requested information
text: I am writing this letter with regards to get the details about the place in foreign country where I recently  shifted . To clarify, I recently landed in Australia on work visa and I am green to this place called Sydney.

Moreover, I want you to give me a hand with appropriate information related to this city ,likewise , the rules and regulations of driving, the facilities provided by their government to employees ,health insurance, the place where I could spend my quality time. Apart from this, help me in searching suitable accommodation as my family will also be shifting here soon.

Along with this, please send me all these facts on my personal contact number or via email which I mentioned in this letter .kindly, guide me with upper queries as soon as possible, so that, I could be able to live here comfortably.
Please respond at your earliest convenience.
